Class SymTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • SymTable
  • public class SymTable
extends java.lang.Object
    SymTable: symbol-table data structure implementation

    each HashMap in the list stores symbols corresponding to specific scope in the compiled program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SymTable()
      constructor: initializes the SymTable's List field to contain a single, empty HashMap.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addDecl​(java.lang.String name, Sym sym)
      add the given name and sym to the first HashMap in the list
      void addScope()
      Add a new, empty HashMap to the front of the list.
      Sym lookupGlobal​(java.lang.String name)
      retrieve symbol by identifier name (key) from any hash maps in the symbol-table
      Sym lookupLocal​(java.lang.String name)
      retrieve symbol by identifier name (key) from first/front hash map element
      java.lang.String print()
      This method is for debugging
      void removeScope()
      remove the HashMap from the front of the list

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • SymTable

        public SymTable()
        constructor: initializes the SymTable's List field to contain a single, empty HashMap.

    • Method Detail

      • addDecl

        public void addDecl​(java.lang.String name,
                    Sym sym)
             throws DuplicateSymException,
                    EmptySymTableException
        add the given name and sym to the first HashMap in the list
        Parameters:
        name -
        sym -
        Throws:
        EmptySymTableException - If this SymTable's list is empty
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If either name or sym (or both) is null
        DuplicateSymException - If the first HashMap in the list already contains the given name as a key

      • addScope

        public void addScope()
        Add a new, empty HashMap to the front of the list.

      • lookupLocal

        public Sym lookupLocal​(java.lang.String name)
                throws EmptySymTableException
        retrieve symbol by identifier name (key) from first/front hash map element
        Parameters:
        name - identifier name corresponds to the hash map key
        Returns:
        matching symbol, otherwise null.
        Throws:
        EmptySymTableException - If this SymTable's list is empty

      • lookupGlobal

        public Sym lookupGlobal​(java.lang.String name)
                 throws EmptySymTableException
        retrieve symbol by identifier name (key) from any hash maps in the symbol-table
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        EmptySymTableException - If this SymTable's list is empty

      • removeScope

        public void removeScope()
                 throws EmptySymTableException
        remove the HashMap from the front of the list
        Throws:
        EmptySymTableException - If this SymTable's list is empty

      • print

        public java.lang.String print()
        This method is for debugging
        Returns:
        string representation of the symbol-table for debugging purposes
